reviewText: I have been looking for these movies for a while.  It was great to find this set of 3 movies all in one!

These are three incredible movies which have unusual stories to tell.  My favorite is Though None go with Me.  It is very touching and always makes me cry.  All of these stories are about struggles and victories.  Good family movies.
Really enjoyed watching good quality family movies!  We need more good tasteful movies for family time!!! Thank you so much!
I bought this as a gift. I heard that they loved it and was a great add on to their DVD's.

these 3 movies will massage your heart and open your tearducts. Watch them with your w=sweetie guys and you both will be sharing tissues, no maybe bring a towel because they all speak to your heart and are filled with uplifting family values

In each case the difficult situations are faced in different ways. In The Mask, the characters try to hide their true emotions because they are afraid to live life. In Hidden Places, the heroine is ready to give up....she has lost her faith along the way, but she regains it when a stranger comes along to help her with the harvest. In the third movie, another heroine has her faith tested many times, but somehow she finds the courage to go on and something to believe in. This three are so close to life that they almost breath.

Okay, I have to admit because I am a big Jason Gedrick fan I purchased this set of movies, but was totally amazed at how much I enjoyed each one.  Donald Sutherland did a great job in Behind the Mask, a very touching story about a man's dedication to those with developmental disabilities and his struggles to help the man who saved his life.  Hidden Places with Jason Gedrick was another touching story about a wandering veteran running from his past and a family about to lose their orchard during the depression and how they found love and helped each other.  The third one, Though None Go with Me was very "faith based" and those who enjoy movies with a strong Christian message will enjoy this movie...although they really needed to do something about the wigs they use in this movie...evidentely was a low budget one.  This is the only movie in the trio that has a strong religious element.  All these movies are just fantastic "feel good" movies the whole family can watch and enjoy.
Have not got the dash cam.  The rest are perfect
